name: Whole Sale & Money Back Guarantee
description: Warehouse allow members to buy goods at wholesale prices.Such books usually wholesale for much less. 100% money back

name: Buy Selling Used Books
description: Here's where to sell used books, whether online or in-person. We've got options for selling textbooks, as well as hardcovers and paperbacks.

name: Cash on Delivery
description: Cash on delivery (C.O.D.), also called collect on delivery, a common business term indicating that goods must be paid for at the time of delivery.

name: Returns & Exchange
description: Write the return address on top left of a label if you're sending a package.You will receive a refund by returning a product within 7 days.
